experience.title: Software Engineer - Backend Developer
experience.description: Backend Development of APIs and SDKs of the Lending Infrastructure and Journey Building Business at FinBox. Pioneered the Creation of KYC as a MicroService Seperated from FinBox's Lending Middleware. Built it's workflow orchestration engine in a client-specific config driven style. Used Server less Workflows and Temporal.io as Orchestrators.The successful creation of client level config driven KYC micorservice with temporal and serverless workflows, paved the way for lending middleware to adopt the same config driven architecture using both these tools across all our clients. Led the adoption ,migration and subsequent onboarding of newer journies on this architecture, which is quickly configurable, scalable and low-code. Built the first version of multi user and co applicant loan journies' tech stack and shipped the stack to production. Built Multi User KYC for such journies. Involved in building FinBox's lending infrastructure to support private limited multi user journies. Contributed to the lending journies of all major clients at FinBox - Poonawalla Fincorp, IIFL, Tata PL, Muthoot Fincorp, Aditya Birla Finance Limited, etc., from ideation and development to production and scale.
